jexer.layout

Class StretchLayoutManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jexer.layout.StretchLayoutManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutManager

    public class StretchLayoutManager
extends Object
implements LayoutManager
    StretchLayoutManager repositions child widgets based on their coordinates when added and the current widget size.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StretchLayoutManager(int width, int height)
      Public constructor.

      void remove(TWidget child)
      Remove a child widget from those managed by this LayoutManager.
      void resetSize(TWidget child)
      Reset a child widget's original/preferred size.
